amendment.description: Amendment requires a report to Congress from the Director of Central Intelligence on the organized resistance in Kosovo known as the Kosovo Liberation Army.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 and printed in the Congressional Record to require a report from the Director of Central Intelligence on the organized resistance in Kosova known as the Kosova Liberation Army.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
